title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 226.7 - Subject matter list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 226.7 - Subject matter list

State Regulations
(a) The records access officer shall maintain a reasonably detailed current list, by subject matter, of all records in its possession. The list shall be
sufficiently detailed to permit the requester to identify the file category of
the records sought. (b) The subject
matter list shall be revised at least semiannually and the date of the most
recent revision shall appear on the first page. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
226.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
